title: Line Highlighting
description: Highlight specific lines and add line numbers
plain_text: Line Highlighting Draw attention to specific lines or add line numbers to code blocks. Highlight Specific Lines Use hl_lines to highlight specific lines: from rosettes import highlight code = '''def greet(name): message = f"Hello, {name}!" return message ''' # Highlight line 2 (1-based indexing) html = highlight(code, "python", hl_lines={2}) The highlighted line receives the .hll CSS class: <div class="rosettes" data-language="python"> <pre><code> <span class="line">def greet(name):</span> <span class="line hll"> message = f"Hello, {name}!"</span> <span class="line"> return message</span> </code></pre> </div> Multiple Lines Pass a set of line numbers: # Highlight lines 2 and 3 html = highlight(code, "python", hl_lines={2, 3}) # Highlight a range html = highlight(code, "python", hl_lines=set(range(2, 5))) # lines 2, 3, 4 Styling Highlighted Lines /* Subtle background highlight */ .rosettes .hll { background-color: rgba(255, 255, 0, 0.1); display: block; } /* Or with a border */ .rosettes .hll { border-left: 3px solid #f1fa8c; padding-left: 0.5em; margin-left: -0.5em; } Line Numbers Add line numbers with show_linenos: html = highlight(code, "python", show_linenos=True) Output structure: <div class="rosettes" data-language="python"> <pre><code> <span class="lineno">1</span><span class="line">def greet(name):</span> <span class="lineno">2</span><span class="line"> message = f"Hello, {name}!"</span> <span class="lineno">3</span><span class="line"> return message</span> </code></pre> </div> Styling Line Numbers .rosettes .lineno { color: #6272a4; user-select: none; /* Don't include in copy */ padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; min-width: 2em; display: inline-block; } Combining Options Use both together: html = highlight( code, "python", show_linenos=True, hl_lines={2, 3}, ) Performance Note Line highlighting and line numbers use the "slow path" internally, which processes tokens line-by-line. For maximum performance without these features, the "fast path" streams tokens directly. Mode Use Case Relative Speed Fast path No line features 1.0x Slow path hl_lines or show_linenos ~0.85x The difference is negligible for most use cases.
